column2: IDEA-193617 Fix a11y of combo boxes

column3: This addresses a regression introduced by change 54c98ac.
See comment in code for description of the fix.
Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please follow the steps described at http://www.jetbrains.com/agreements/cla/ to sign it.
@klikh I am a member of the Android Studio team @ Google.
Ah, OK. This info is not visible on your profile page. Thanks for clarification, no CLA is needed in this case.

Oh, I didn't realize this info was private. I just made it public. Also, I have contributed many a11y fixes in the past couple of years, feel free to contact @forantar, he helped me merge a few dozens of them already.
@rpaquay Yep, everything is fine with the legal part now, thanks.
I've forwarded the pull request for responsible developers, they'll review it soon.

Hi Renaud,
Thank you for the fix, your contribution to a11y support is very welcome!
